div.p: Any of the two deployments are possible viz. deployment in Apache Solr, or Any other web container like Tomcat. Any of the case the procedure is same. Only for other web container than Apache Solr needs extra configuration in web.xml which is described in configuration section. Following are the steps:

blockquote.p: 1. Extract the solr.war which is available in Apache-Solr-Home/example/webapps/ and a new folder named solr will be created
2. Copy seplugin.jar from seplugin project's target folder to Apache-Solr-Home/example/webapps/solr/WEB-INF/lib
3. Copy all the files from seplugin project's lib folder to Apache-Solr-Home/example/webapps/solr/WEB-INF/lib
4. Configure web.xml as described in Configuration Section
6. Copy the solr.war to the webapps folder of the web container in case of web container other than Apache Solr
